notes.note: Created first attempt at a common build environment for the portal team. Sent tar.gz to Brian. His configuration is a little different to mine. JDK 1.4.0 Tomcat 4.1.24-jdk14 (not LE) Ant 1.5.3 CVS checkout and Cocoon build went ok. Running Tomcat using the Ant script works ok. Deploying Cocoon in Tomcat fails. Tried replacing tomcat/common/endorsed with cocoon/lib/endorsed
